_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five things to establish before teac: Teach Dhamma to others thinking: ‘I will teach step by step.’
Teach Dhamma to others thinking: ‘I will teach explaining my methods.’
Teach Dhamma to others thinking: ‘I will teach out of kindness.’
Not teach while secretly hoping to profit.
Teach without hurting oneself or others.
